verses.verse: Jesus, Friend of little children, Be a friend to me; Take my hand and ever keep me close to Thee.
Teach me how to grow in goodness, Daily as I grow; Thou hast been a child, and surely Thou dost know.
Step by step, O, lead me onward, Upward into youth; Wiser, stronger, still becoming in Thy truth.
Never leave me, nor forsake me, ever be my Friend; For I need Thee from life's dawning to its end.
